node.title: Unvaccinated surgeons fined $12,000 for seeing patients
node.description: Two eye surgeons have been fined for breaching Covid-19 health orders by seeing patients without being vaccinated.
node.content:
["Two eye surgeons have been fined for breaching Covid-19 health orders by seeing patients without being vaccinated.", "", "
File pic Photo: 123RF
", "A Ministry of Health spokesperson said the pair have both been deregistered with the Medical Council and can no longer practise.", "Both received infringement notices from the ministry which carry a $4000 fine for each one.", "They say Napier surgeon Phil Macdonald has received two fines.", "Dr Deepak Gupta in Dunedin has also been fined - for the third time.", "Anyone who was treated by Dr Macdonald or Dr Gupta from late January onwards is urged to contact the Ministry of Health."]
